snippet.title: Metal Soldiers 3 Gameplay (Android)
snippet.description:
Metal Soldiers 3 Gameplay (Android)
Metal Soldiers 3 Gameplay
Metal Soldiers 3

Get yourself ready for the ultimate action game!
A modern approach to the classic arcade feel, Metal Soldiers 3 takes platform-style 2d shooters to the next level.
Choose your favorite hero and battle the rebel forces throughout 120 challenging levels, or enjoy the unlimited action on the endless mode.
Destroy your enemies with the Power Mech, Battle Tank, and even helicopters! Use your weapons and grenades too!
Be careful though, the rivals got some serious new equipment. Engage in amazing tank battles or ground-to-air tank-helicopter combats. Set your tactics right and blow up the nemesis armored aberrations in the extremely hard boss fights!

What are you waiting for? Download Metal Soldiers 3 now and let the action begin!

Features:
- Simple and intuitive controls.
- Hundred of hours of challenging fun.
- Over 100 levels.
- 9 heroes to choose from.
- Tanks. Choppers. Mechas.
- Lots of enemies to fight.
- Classic and futuristic weapons.
- Amazing gameplay.

Total Size: 173MB
Game Download: 
Playstore: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.play365.metal3
APK: https://apkcombo.com/id-id/metal-soldiers-3/com.play365.metal3/

Click here to SUBSCRIBE: @7LGAMEPLAY 

Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/7lgameplay

Twitter: https://twitter.com/7l_gameplay

SUBSCRIBE for more videos 👌
Thanks for watching ✌️
